trans-unit.source: Provides low-level control for drawing text in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) applications.
trans-unit.target: 为 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 应用程序中的绘图文本提供低级别的控制。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText> object allows you to draw multi-line text, in which each character in the text can be individually formatted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText>对象允许你绘制多行文本，在其中每个字符文本中的可以单独设置格式。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows text that has several formats applied to it.
trans-unit.target: 下例演示应用了多种格式的文本。

trans-unit.source: ![Text displayed using FormattedText object](~/add/media/formattedtext01.jpg "Text displayed using FormattedText object")
trans-unit.target: ![使用 FormattedText 对象显示的文本](~/add/media/formattedtext01.jpg "使用 FormattedText 对象显示的文本")

trans-unit.source: Example of a formatted text string
trans-unit.target: 格式化的文本字符串的示例

trans-unit.source: In terms of text features in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText> is considered "low-level" because it processes text as graphical elements.
trans-unit.target: 在文本中的功能方面[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText>被视为"低级别"，因为它作为图形元素处理文本。

trans-unit.source: Other aspects of text in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] handle text in the context of controls that are dedicated to text (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>), implement the flow document model (see [Flow Document Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/flow-document-overview.md)), or support the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document model (see [Documents in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/documents-in-wpf.md)).
trans-unit.target: 中的文本的其他方面[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]处理专用于文本的控件的上下文中的文本 (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>)，实现流文档模型 (请参阅[流文档概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/flow-document-overview.md))，或支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档模型 (请参阅[WPF 中的文档](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/documents-in-wpf.md))。

trans-unit.source: Many of the setter methods in <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText> have similarities to attached properties that are supported by <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>, but the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement> attached properties apply to the higher-level text support either for flow or [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 中的 setter 方法的许多<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText>具有到支持的附加属性的相似之处<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>，但<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>附加的属性应用于的更高级别的文本支持为流或[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText> object and then applies several formatting styles to the text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText>对象，然后将几种格式设置样式应用于的文本。

trans-unit.source: The Pixels Per Density Independent Pixel value, which is the equivalent of the scale factor.
trans-unit.target: 按“密度无关像素”单位计算的像素值，等效于比例因子。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the DPI of a screen is 120 (or 1.25 because 120/96 = 1.25) , 1.25 pixel per density independent pixel is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果屏幕的 DPI 为 120（或 1.25，因为 120/96 = 1.25），那么“密度无关像素”值为 1.25。

trans-unit.source: DIP is the unit of measurement used by WPF to be independent of device resolution and DPIs.
trans-unit.target: DPI 是 WPF 采用的独立于设备分辨率和 DPI 的度量单位。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the top of the first line to the baseline of the first line of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> 对象中从第一行顶部到第一行基线的距离。

trans-unit.source: The distance from the top of the first line to the baseline of the first line, provided in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 从第一行顶部到第一行基线的距离，用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]提供。

trans-unit.source: The top-left origin of the resulting geometry.
trans-unit.target: 所生成的几何图形的左上原点。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> object that represents the formatted text, including all glyphs and text decorations.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 对象，该对象表示格式化文本，包括所有标志符号和文本修饰。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> object representation of the formatted text.
trans-unit.target: 格式化文本的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 对象表示形式。

trans-unit.source: When text is converted to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> object, it is no longer a collection of characters—you cannot modify the characters in the text string.
trans-unit.target: 当文本转换为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>对象，它不再是字符的集合，无法修改的文本字符串中的字符。

trans-unit.source: However, you can affect the appearance of the converted text by modifying its stroke and fill properties.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可修改已转换文本的笔划和填充属性，以此来影响该文本的外观。

trans-unit.source: The following examples illustrate several ways of creating visual effects by modifying the stroke and fill of converted text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例说明了多种方法可以通过修改的笔画和填充的已转换的文本来创建视觉效果。

trans-unit.source: ![Text with different colors for fill and stroke](~/add/media/outlinedtext03.jpg "Text with different colors for fill and stroke")
trans-unit.target: ![对填充和笔画使用不同颜色的文本](~/add/media/outlinedtext03.jpg "对填充和笔画使用不同颜色的文本")

trans-unit.source: Example of setting stroke and fill to different colors
trans-unit.target: 将笔划和填充设置为不同颜色的示例

trans-unit.source: ![Text with image brush applied to stroke](~/add/media/outlinedtext04.jpg "Text with image brush applied to stroke")
trans-unit.target: ![笔画应用了图像画笔的文本](~/add/media/outlinedtext04.jpg "笔画应用了图像画笔的文本")

trans-unit.source: Example of an image brush applied to the stroke
trans-unit.target: 笔划应用了图像画笔的示例

trans-unit.source: Text that is converted to and rendered as a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> object may not look the same as text rendered directly:
trans-unit.target: 转换为和呈现为文本<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>对象可能不会被视为直接呈现的文本：

trans-unit.source: Text converted to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> object is not rendered using ClearType.
trans-unit.target: 文本转换为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>不使用 ClearType 呈现对象。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the baseline of the converted is not snapped to a whole display pixel.
trans-unit.target: 此外，转换后的基线不对齐到整个显示像素。

trans-unit.source: Small fonts, such as those commonly used in body text, may lose legibility, appear blurred, and vary in appearance.
trans-unit.target: 小字体，例如通常使用的正文，可能会丢失易读性，显示和经过模糊处理，和在外观上有所不同。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText> object and to retrieve the geometries of the formatted text and its bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText>对象并检索带格式的文本和其边界框的几何图形。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> object that represents the highlight bounding box of the formatted text.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 对象，该对象表示格式化文本的高光点边界框。

trans-unit.source: The origin of the highlight region.
trans-unit.target: 高光点区域的原点。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> object that represents the highlight bounding box of the formatted text.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 对象，该对象表示格式化文本的高光点边界框。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> object that represents the highlight bounding box of the formatted text.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 对象，该对象表示格式化文本的高光点边界框。

trans-unit.source: The bounding box region contains the entire formatted text area starting at the point specified by `origin`.
trans-unit.target: 边界框区域包含从指定的点开始的整个格式化的文本区域`origin`。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> object contains only the bounding box of the highlighted text and does not contain any rendered text.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>对象包含仅突出显示的文本的边界框，并且不包含任何呈现的文本。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates a way to creating visual effects by modifying the stroke and highlight of converted text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示通过修改笔划和突出显示的已转换的文本来创建视觉效果的方法。

trans-unit.source: ![Text with image brush applied to stroke](~/add/media/outlinedtext05.jpg "Text with image brush applied to stroke")
trans-unit.target: ![笔画应用了图像画笔的文本](~/add/media/outlinedtext05.jpg "笔画应用了图像画笔的文本")

trans-unit.source: Example of an image brush applied to the stroke and highlight
trans-unit.target: 笔划和突出显示应用了图像画笔的示例

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText> object and to retrieve the geometries of the formatted text and its bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText>对象并检索带格式的文本和其边界框的几何图形。

trans-unit.source: The origin of the highlight region.
trans-unit.target: 高光点区域的原点。

trans-unit.source: The index of the initial character the highlight bounds should be obtained for.
trans-unit.target: 应为其获取高光点边界的初始字符的索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters the highlight bounds should contain.
trans-unit.target: 高光点边界应包含的字符数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> object that represents the highlight bounding box for a specified substring of the formatted text.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 对象，该对象表示格式化文本的指定子字符串的高光点边界框。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> object that represents the highlight bounding box of the formatted text substring.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 对象，表示格式化文本子字符串的高光点边界框。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> object contains only the bounding box of the highlighted text and does not contain any rendered text.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>对象包含仅突出显示的文本的边界框，并且不包含任何呈现的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the topmost drawn pixel of the first line to the bottommost drawn pixel of the last line.
trans-unit.target: 获取从第一行最顶部绘制的像素到最后一行最底部绘制的像素之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: The distance from the topmost drawn pixel of the first line to the bottommost drawn pixel of the last line, provided in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 从第一行最顶部绘制的像素到最后一行最底部绘制的像素之间的距离，用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]提供。

trans-unit.source: Extent incorporates any graphical elements that might be present in a glyph, including decorative elements that might go outside the line height, baseline, or overhangs.
trans-unit.target: 扩展盘区包含可能会出现的标志符号，包括可能超出行高度、 基线或延伸量的装饰性元素在任何图形元素。

trans-unit.source: This value is dependent on characters appearing on the line and is thus not used (and should not be used) to derive line spacing.
trans-unit.target: 此值依赖于行上显示的字符，因此不使用 （和不应使用） 用于派生行距。

trans-unit.source: It can however be used to align the top or bottom of paragraphs with graphical elements, or for hit-testing.
trans-unit.target: 不过可以将其用于对齐的顶部或底部段落的图形元素，或用于命中测试。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FlowDirection" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FlowDirection" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FlowDirection" /> of the formatted text.
trans-unit.target: 格式化文本的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FlowDirection" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an array of text widths.
trans-unit.target: 检索一个由文本宽度组成的数组。

trans-unit.source: Each element in the array represents the maximum text width of sequential lines of text.
trans-unit.target: 该数组中的每个元素都表示连续文本行的最大文本宽度。

trans-unit.source: An array of maximum text widths, each width provided in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 一个由最大文本宽度组成的数组，其中每个宽度都用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]提供。

trans-unit.source: If the text lines exceed the number of elements in the array, the last element value is used for the remaining lines.
trans-unit.target: 如果文本行数超过数组中元素的数目，最后一个元素值用于剩余行。

trans-unit.source: If the array of lengths is not `null`, the array values of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.GetMaxTextWidths%2A> are used instead of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxTextWidth%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组的长度不为`null`，数组值的<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.GetMaxTextWidths%2A>而不是使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxTextWidth%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the top of the first line to the bottom of the last line of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> 对象中从第一行顶部到最后一行底部的距离。

trans-unit.source: The distance from the top of the first line to the bottom of the last line, provided in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 从第一行顶部到最后一行底部的距离，用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]提供。

trans-unit.source: Gets the line height, or line spacing, between lines of text.
trans-unit.target: 获取文本行之间的行高或行距。

trans-unit.source: The line spacing between lines of text, provided in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 文本行之间的行距，用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]提供。

trans-unit.source: The default line height is automatically calculated, and is based on the font value that is passed as a parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 默认行高度自动计算，并基于作为参数传递的字体值<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of lines to display.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要显示的最大行数。

trans-unit.source: Text exceeding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxLineCount" /> will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 超出 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxLineCount" /> 的文本将不会显示。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of lines to display.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的最大行数。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.Trimming%2A> property to control how omitted text is represented when the text exceeds the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxLineCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.Trimming%2A>属性来控制如何被省略的文本表示文本超过时<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxLineCount%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum height of a text column.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文本列的最大高度。

trans-unit.source: The maximum height of a text column, provided in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 文本列的最大高度，用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]提供。

trans-unit.source: The last line of text displayed is the last whole line that will fit within the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxTextHeight%2A> limit or the line number that does not exceed the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxLineCount%2A> property, whichever occurs first.
trans-unit.target: 显示文本的最后一行是最后一个适合的整行<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxTextHeight%2A>限制或不超过的行号<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxLineCount%2A>属性，者为准第一次。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText> object and then applies several formatting styles to the text, including <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxTextHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText>对象，然后将几种格式设置样式应用于文本，包括<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxTextHeight%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum text width (length) for a line of text.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文本行的最大文本宽度（长度）。

trans-unit.source: The maximum text width for a line of text, provided in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 文本行的最大文本宽度，用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]提供。

trans-unit.source: Text will wrap to avoid exceeding the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxTextWidth%2A> limit.
trans-unit.target: 文本会换行以避免超过<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxTextWidth%2A>限制。

trans-unit.source: Glyph alignment edges must be kept within the line count limits.
trans-unit.target: 必须在行的计数限制内保持标志符号对齐边缘。

trans-unit.source: Because many fonts contain glyphs that slightly overhang their alignment edges, allow at least 1/6 em (font size) margin beyond the line count requested, to leave room for such overhangs.
trans-unit.target: 由于许多字体包含略微延伸出它们的对齐边缘的标志符号，允许至少为 1/6 em （字体大小） 边距的行计数之外请求，为这类延伸留出空间。

trans-unit.source: A zero value for line count is treated as an infinite line count.
trans-unit.target: 行计数的零值视为无限行计数。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText> object and then applies several formatting styles to the text, including <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxTextWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText>对象，然后将几种格式设置样式应用于文本，包括<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxTextWidth%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the smallest possible text width that can fully contain the specified text content.
trans-unit.target: 获取可完全容纳指定文本内容的可能的最小文本宽度。

trans-unit.source: The minimum text width of the text source, provided in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 文本源的最小文本宽度，用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]提供。

trans-unit.source: The following illustrated text uses the minimum text width for the source text, which displays as multiple lines.
trans-unit.target: 下面演示的文本的源文本，后者将显示为多行使用最小文本宽度。

trans-unit.source: The minimum text width corresponds to the word that has the greatest width—in this case, the word "jumped".
trans-unit.target: 最小文本宽度对应于具有的最大宽度的单词 — 在这种情况下，是跳转单词"用户"。

trans-unit.source: Notice that multiple words can appear on the same line, as long as their total width does not exceed the minimum text width.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，多个单词可以位于同一行中，只要它们的总宽度不能超过最小文本宽度。

trans-unit.source: ![Text Formatter using the minimum paragraph width](~/add/media/textformatter03.png "Text Formatter using the minimum paragraph width")
trans-unit.target: ![使用最小段落宽度的文本格式化程序](~/add/media/textformatter03.png "文本格式化程序使用最小段落宽度")

trans-unit.source: Minimum text width
trans-unit.target: 最小文本宽度

trans-unit.source: If the value passed to <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxTextWidth%2A> is greater than or equal to the value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MinWidth%2A>, the text is formatted without ellipsis characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果将值传递给<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxTextWidth%2A>大于或等于的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MinWidth%2A>，文本的格式设置不使用省略号字符。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MinWidth%2A> property to generate the minimum text width for the formatted lines of text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MinWidth%2A>属性生成带格式的文本行的最小文本宽度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the bottom of the last line of text to the bottommost drawn pixel.
trans-unit.target: 获取从文本最后一行的底部到最底部绘制的像素之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: The distance from the bottom of the last line to the bottommost inked pixel, provided in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 从最后一行的底部到最底部绘制的像素之间的距离，用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]提供。

trans-unit.source: The value is positive if the bottommost drawn pixel goes below the line bottom, and is negative if it is within (on or above) the line.
trans-unit.target: 如果底部绘制的像素低于行底部，并且为负中 （在或更高版本） 时，值为正行。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum distance from the leading alignment point to the leading drawn pixel of a line.
trans-unit.target: 获取一行中从前导对齐点到前导绘制像素之间的最大距离。

trans-unit.source: The maximum distance from the leading alignment point to the leading drawn pixel of a line, provided in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 一行中从前导对齐点到前导绘制像素之间的最大距离，用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]提供。

trans-unit.source: When the leading alignment point comes before the leading drawn pixel, the value is negative.
trans-unit.target: 当前导对齐点出现之前前导绘制像素时，值为负。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum distance from the trailing inked pixel to the trailing alignment point of a line.
trans-unit.target: 获取一行中从尾随绘制像素到尾随对齐点之间的最大距离。

trans-unit.source: The maximum distance from the trailing inked pixel to the trailing alignment point of a line, provided in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 一行中从尾随绘制像素到尾随对齐点之间的最大距离，用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]提供。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.OverhangTrailing%2A> value will be positive when the trailing drawn pixel comes before the trailing alignment point.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.OverhangTrailing%2A>尾随绘制的像素位于之前尾随的对齐点时，值将为正。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the PixelsPerDip at which the text should be rendered.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置呈现文本时应使用的 PixelsPerDip。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.PixelsPerDip" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.PixelsPerDip" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> for the formatted text.
trans-unit.target: 设置格式化文本的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> to use for text formatting.
trans-unit.target: 要用于设置文本格式的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> for the entire set of characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 对象中整个字符集的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class holds culture-specific information, such as the associated language, sublanguage, country/region, calendar, and cultural conventions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>类包含特定于区域性的信息，如关联的语言、 子语言、 国家/地区、 日历和区域性的约定。

trans-unit.source: This class also provides access to culture-specific instances of <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>, <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo>, and <xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 此类还提供对区域性特定的实例访问<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>， <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo>，和<xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo>。

trans-unit.source: These objects contain the information required for culture-specific operations, such as casing, formatting dates and numbers, and comparing strings.
trans-unit.target: 这些对象包含特定于区域性的操作，如大小写、 格式化日期和数字和比较字符串所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the culture information value for the entire text string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置的整个文本字符串的区域性信息值。

trans-unit.source: To set the culture information value for a subset of the text string, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetCulture%28System.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的文本字符串的子集的区域性信息值，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetCulture%28System.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> to use for text formatting.
trans-unit.target: 要用于设置文本格式的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The start index of initial character to apply the change to.
trans-unit.target: 要向其应用更改的初始字符的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters the change should be applied to.
trans-unit.target: 应向其应用更改的字符数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> for a specified subset of characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 对象中指定的字符子集的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class holds culture-specific information, such as the associated language, sublanguage, country/region, calendar, and cultural conventions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>类包含特定于区域性的信息，如关联的语言、 子语言、 国家/地区、 日历和区域性的约定。

trans-unit.source: This class also provides access to culture-specific instances of <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>, <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo>, and <xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 此类还提供对区域性特定的实例访问<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>， <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo>，和<xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo>。

trans-unit.source: These objects contain the information required for culture-specific operations, such as casing, formatting dates and numbers, and comparing strings.
trans-unit.target: 这些对象包含特定于区域性的操作，如大小写、 格式化日期和数字和比较字符串所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: To set the culture information value for the entire text string, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetCulture%28System.Globalization.CultureInfo%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的整个文本字符串的区域性信息值，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetCulture%28System.Globalization.CultureInfo%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font family for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> 对象的字体系列。

trans-unit.source: A string that constructs the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> to use for text formatting.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，用于构造在设置文本格式时要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" />。

trans-unit.source: Fallbacks are permitted; for details, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" />.
trans-unit.target: 允许回退；有关详细信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font family for the entire set of characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> 对象中整个字符集的字体系列。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the font family value for the entire text string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置的整个文本字符串的字体系列值。

trans-unit.source: To set the font family value for a subset of the text string, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetFontFamily%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的文本字符串的子集的字体系列值，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetFontFamily%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> to use for text formatting.
trans-unit.target: 要用于设置文本格式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font family for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> 对象的字体系列。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the font family value for the entire text string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置的整个文本字符串的字体系列值。

trans-unit.source: To set the font family value for a subset of the text string, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetFontFamily%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的文本字符串的子集的字体系列值，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetFontFamily%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A string that constructs the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> to use for text formatting.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，用于构造在设置文本格式时要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" />。

trans-unit.source: Fallbacks are permitted; for details, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" />.
trans-unit.target: 允许回退；有关详细信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" />。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the initial character to apply the font family change to.
trans-unit.target: 要向其应用字体系列更改的初始字符的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters the change should apply to.
trans-unit.target: 应向其应用更改的字符数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font family for a specified subset of characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> 对象中指定的字符子集的字体系列。

trans-unit.source: To set the font family value for the entire text string, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetFontFamily%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的整个文本字符串的字体系列值，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetFontFamily%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> to use for text formatting.
trans-unit.target: 要用于设置文本格式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" />。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the initial character to apply the font family change to.
trans-unit.target: 要向其应用字体系列更改的初始字符的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters the change should apply to.
trans-unit.target: 应向其应用更改的字符数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font family for a specified subset of characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> 对象中指定的字符子集的字体系列。

trans-unit.source: To set the font family value for the entire text string, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetFontFamily%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的整个文本字符串的字体系列值，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetFontFamily%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font size.
trans-unit.target: 设置字号。

trans-unit.source: The font 'em' measure size, provided in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 字体的全身尺寸，用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]提供。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font size for the entire set of characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> 对象中整个字符集的字号。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the font size value for the entire text string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置的整个文本字符串的字体大小值。

trans-unit.source: To set the font size value for a subset of the text string, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetFontSize%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: The font stretch value refers to the degree to which a font is stretched on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 字体拉伸值是指一种字体拉伸在屏幕的程度。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretch> supports type conversion behavior such that static values of the <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches> class can be used to initialize <xref:System.Windows.FontStretch> and fill parameters that are type <xref:System.Windows.FontStretch>.

trans-unit.source: An array of maximum text widths, each width provided in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 一个由最大文本宽度组成的数组，其中每个宽度都用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]提供。

trans-unit.source: Sets an array of maximum text widths within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" />, on a per-line basis.
trans-unit.target: 逐行设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> 中最大文本宽度的数组。

trans-unit.source: Each element in the array represents the maximum text width of sequential lines of text.
trans-unit.target: 该数组中的每个元素都表示连续文本行的最大文本宽度。

trans-unit.source: If the text lines exceed the number of elements in the array, the last value in the array is used for the remaining lines.
trans-unit.target: 如果文本行数超过数组中元素的数目，数组中的最后一个值用于剩余行。

trans-unit.source: Providing a valid array <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetMaxTextWidths%2A> will override any value provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxTextWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 提供有效的数组<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetMaxTextWidths%2A>将重写为提供任何值<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.MaxTextWidth%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Number substitution behavior to apply to the text; can be <see langword="null" />, in which case the default number substitution method for the text culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于文本的数字替换行为；它可以为 <see langword="null" />，此时将使用针对文本区域性的默认数字替换方法。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution>类指定文本中的数字的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: To set the number substitution behavior for the entire text string, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetNumberSubstitution%28System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的整个文本字符串的数字替换行为，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetNumberSubstitution%28System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection" /> to apply to the text.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于文本的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection" /> for the entire set of characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection" /> 对象中整个字符集的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> class specifies the types of text decorations to apply to the text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection>类指定要应用于文本的文本修饰的类型。

trans-unit.source: There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline.
trans-unit.target: 文本修饰的四种类型： 下划线、 基线、 删除线和上划线。

trans-unit.source: These are described as <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationLocation> values that are set on each item in the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 这些被称为<xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationLocation>中每一项设置的值<xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection>。

trans-unit.source: It is common that the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> collection contains only one decoration, but the property uses the collection to provide for more advanced decoration effects by applying multiple decorations to the same text.
trans-unit.target: 是很常见，<xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection>集合只包含一个修饰，但该属性使用该集合为更高级的修饰效果提供通过将多个效果应用于相同的文本。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the locations of the text decorations relative to the text.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示相对于文本的文本修饰的位置。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations")
trans-unit.target: ![文本修饰位置示意图](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "文本修饰位置示意图")

trans-unit.source: Example of text decoration types
trans-unit.target: 文本修饰类型的示例

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> for the entire text string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会设置<xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection>整个文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> for a subset of the text string, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetTextDecorations%28System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置<xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection>的文本字符串的一个子集，对于使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetTextDecorations%28System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection" /> to apply to the text.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于文本的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The start index of the initial character to apply the text decorations to.
trans-unit.target: 要向其应用文本修饰的初始字符的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to apply the text decorations to.
trans-unit.target: 要向其应用文本修饰的字符数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection" /> for specified text within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection" /> 对象中指定文本的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> class specifies the types of text decorations to apply to the text.

trans-unit.source: There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline.
trans-unit.target: 文本修饰的四种类型： 下划线、 基线、 删除线和上划线。

trans-unit.source: These are described as <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationLocation> values that are set on each item in the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 这些被称为<xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationLocation>中每一项设置的值<xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection>。

trans-unit.source: It is common that the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> collection contains only one decoration, but the property uses the collection to provide for more advanced decoration effects by applying multiple decorations to the same text.
trans-unit.target: 是很常见，<xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection>集合只包含一个修饰，但该属性使用该集合为更高级的修饰效果提供通过将多个效果应用于相同的文本。

trans-unit.target: 下图显示相对于文本的文本修饰的位置。

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> for the entire text string, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetTextDecorations%28System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置<xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection>对于整个文本字符串中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.SetTextDecorations%28System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the string of text to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取要显示的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string of text to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: This property is not settable on a constructed <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不是可在构造上设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText>对象。

trans-unit.source: You must construct a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText> in order to set different text.
trans-unit.target: 您必须先构造一个新<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText>以便设置不同的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of text within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> 对象中文本的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextAlignment" /> values that specifies the alignment of text within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextAlignment" /> 值之一，它指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText" /> 对象中的文本的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the means by which the omission of text is indicated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置省略文本的指示方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextTrimming" /> values that specifies how the omission of text is indicated.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextTrimming" /> 值之一，它指定省略文本的指示方式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.TextTrimming.WordEllipsis" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.TextTrimming.WordEllipsis" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width between the leading and trailing alignment points of a line, excluding any trailing white-space characters.
trans-unit.target: 获取一行中前导对齐点和尾随对齐点之间的宽度（不包括任何尾随空格字符）。

trans-unit.source: The width between the leading and trailing alignment points of a line, excluding any trailing white-space characters.
trans-unit.target: 一行中前导对齐点和尾随对齐点之间的宽度（不包括任何尾随空格字符）。

trans-unit.source: Provided in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]提供。

trans-unit.source: For multi-line text, the longest line is used for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.Width%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 对于多行文本，最长的行用于<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.Width%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width between the leading and trailing alignment points of a line, including any trailing white-space characters.
trans-unit.target: 获取一行中前导对齐点和尾随对齐点之间的宽度（包括所有尾随空格字符）。

trans-unit.source: The width between the leading and trailing alignment points of a line, including any trailing white-space characters.
trans-unit.target: 一行中前导对齐点和尾随对齐点之间的宽度（包括所有尾随空格字符）。

trans-unit.source: Provided in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]提供。

trans-unit.source: For multi-line text, the longest line is used for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.WidthIncludingTrailingWhitespace%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 对于多行文本，最长的行用于<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText.WidthIncludingTrailingWhitespace%2A>值。
